thread.title: Wiz Khalifa & Amber Rose Make Statement With Red Carpet Kiss
thread.title_full: Wiz Khalifa & Amber Rose Make Statement With Red Carpet Kiss

author: Trent Clark
title: Wiz Khalifa & Amber Rose Make Statement With Red Carpet Kiss
text:
Wiz Khalifa & Amber Rose Make Statement With Red Carpet Kiss February 12, 2017 | 11:59 AM 5 
Beverly Hills, CA – Despite being divorced , Wiz Khalifa and Amber Rose have shown time after time that they know how to act civilized in the public eye . If not for the sake of their soon-to-be-four-year-old son but for their underlying love for one another. 
Last night in Beverly Hills at Clive Davis’ annual pre-Grammy party, the couple attended the event together and posed for the red carpet. The Recording Academy and Davis teamed up to debut a special Instagram portrait booth with appearances from Chance The Rapper, John Legend, Rita Ora and more, and stars honored Prince during a blitz of performances . But it was Wiz and Amber who stole the social media reactions when they purposefully put on some PDA in front of the flashing lights.
